languages.text: {n}Идира кривит губы в злой усмешке.{/n} "О, не стоит, Лорд-капитан. Экипаж давным-давно научился держаться от меня подальше. Боятся, что я рядом постою и ка-а-ак услышу что-то такое эдакое, за что им стыдно будет. Дурачье! Делать мне нечего, как исподнее их совести разглядывать! Ха!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира кривит губы в злой усмешке.{/n} "О, не стоит, Лорд-капитан. Экипаж давным-давно научился держаться от меня подальше. Боятся, что я рядом постою и ка-а-ак услышу что-то такое эдакое, за что им стыдно будет. Дурачье! Делать мне нечего, как исподнее их совести разглядывать! Ха!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира кривит губы в злой усмешке.{/n} "О, не стоит, Лорд-капитан. Экипаж давным-давно научился держаться от меня подальше. Боятся, что я рядом постою и ка-а-ак услышу что-то такое эдакое, за что им стыдно будет. Дурачье! Делать мне нечего, как исподнее их совести разглядывать! Ха!"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉嘴角露出了恶意的笑容。{/n}“噢，没必要担心他们，舰长大人。那些船员很久以前就学会了和我保持距离。他们以为我只要站在他们身边，嗖！就能听到令人尴尬的秘密，这简直是一派胡言！就好像我除了窥视他们心中的抽屉之外，根本没有更好的事情要做一样！哈！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉嘴角露出了恶意的笑容。{/n}“噢，没必要担心他们，舰长大人。那些船员很久以前就学会了和我保持距离。他们以为我只要站在他们身边，嗖！就能听到令人尴尬的秘密，这简直是一派胡言！就好像我除了窥视他们心中的抽屉之外，根本没有更好的事情要做一样！哈！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

languages.text: {n}Los labios de Idira se curvan en una sonrisa astuta.{/n} «Oh, no se preocupe, Lord Capitán. La tripulación aprendió hace mucho a guardar las distancias conmigo. Tienen miedo de que me acerque a ellos y oiga algo vergonzoso al instante. ¡Qué absurdo! ¡Como si no tuviera nada mejor que hacer que cotillear en los cajones de la ropa interior de su mente! ¡Ja!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de Idira se curvan en una sonrisa astuta.{/n} «Oh, no se preocupe, Lord Capitán. La tripulación aprendió hace mucho a guardar las distancias conmigo. Tienen miedo de que me acerque a ellos y oiga algo vergonzoso al instante. ¡Qué absurdo! ¡Como si no tuviera nada mejor que hacer que cotillear en los cajones de la ropa interior de su mente! ¡Ja!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラの口元が悪意に満ちた笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ああ、その必要はないわ、ロード・キャプテン。クルーたちはずいぶん前に、あたいから距離を置くことを覚えたのよ。あたいが隣に立ってたら何か恥ずかしいことを聞かれるかもしれないって恐れているの。バカバカしいわ！あたいが彼らの心の下着の引き出しを覗き見するとでも思っているのかしらね！ハッ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの口元が悪意に満ちた笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ああ、その必要はないわ、ロード・キャプテン。クルーたちはずいぶん前に、あたいから距離を置くことを覚えたのよ。あたいが隣に立ってたら何か恥ずかしいことを聞かれるかもしれないって恐れているの。バカバカしいわ！あたいが彼らの心の下着の引き出しを覗き見するとでも思っているのかしらね！ハッ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idiras Lippen formen sich zu einem boshaften Grinsen.{/n} "Oh, das ist nicht nötig, Lord Captain. Die Crew hat schon vor langer Zeit gelernt, Abstand zu mir zu halten. Sie haben Angst, ich könnte mich neben sie stellen und einfach so etwas Peinliches hören. Lächerlich! Als hätte ich nichts Besseres zu tun, als die Unterwäscheschublade ihres Verstandes zu durchwühlen! Ha!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idiras Lippen formen sich zu einem boshaften Grinsen.{/n} "Oh, das ist nicht nötig, Lord Captain. Die Crew hat schon vor langer Zeit gelernt, Abstand zu mir zu halten. Sie haben Angst, ich könnte mich neben sie stellen und einfach so etwas Peinliches hören. Lächerlich! Als hätte ich nichts Besseres zu tun, als die Unterwäscheschublade ihres Verstandes zu durchwühlen! Ha!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}La bouche d'Idira se tord en un sourire malveillant.{/n} « Oh, c'est inutile, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. L'équipage a appris il y a bien longtemps à garder ses distances avec moi. Ils ont peur que j'apprenne des trucs gênants rien qu'en me tenant à côté d'eux. Mais c'est ridicule ! Comme si je n'avais rien de mieux à faire que de farfouiller dans leurs tiroirs à petites culottes spirituels ! Ha ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La bouche d'Idira se tord en un sourire malveillant.{/n} « Oh, c'est inutile, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. L'équipage a appris il y a bien longtemps à garder ses distances avec moi. Ils ont peur que j'apprenne des trucs gênants rien qu'en me tenant à côté d'eux. Mais c'est ridicule ! Comme si je n'avais rien de mieux à faire que de farfouiller dans leurs tiroirs à petites culottes spirituels ! Ha ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın dudaklarında hınzır bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Endişeye mahal yok be Lord Kaptan. Tayfalar, benimle aralarına mesafe koymaları gerektiğini çoktan öğrendi. Yanlarında şak diye belirip utanacakları bir şeyler duyacağım diye ödleri kopuyor. Saçmalık işte! Sanki işim gücüm yok da zihinlerindeki edepsiz düşünceleri didikleyeceğim! Hah!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's mouth curls into a malicious grin.{/n} "Oh, there's no need, Lord Captain. The crew learned a long time ago to keep their distance from me. They're afraid I'll stand next to them and, just like that, I'll hear something embarrassing. Ridiculous! Like I have nothing better to do than to snoop through their mind's undergarment drawer! Ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın dudaklarında hınzır bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Ah Lord Kaptan, endişeye hiç gerek yok. Mürettebattakiler, benimle aralarına mesafe koymaları gerektiğini çoktan öğrendiler. Yanlarında belirip aniden onları utandıracak bir şey duyacağım diye ödleri kopuyor. Saçmalık işte! Sanki başka işim yok da zihinlerindeki edepsiz düşünceleri didik didik edeceğim! Hah!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
